message.body: Hey. You okay? That nightmare sounds like a real doozy.
Yeah, it was a bit disturbing and seemed to go on and on like a relentless torturing.
Maybe if I had just died it would have ended but that's not how I roll ;)
I'm so sorry! Hopefully, it'll let you sleep without returning.
Maybe I should kick this puppy out of my bed. It's probably his fault ;) he usually sleeps with Julia but she's not here tonight.

Maybe you're channeling his anxiety...
Sleep well. Talk to you spin.
Soon. Not spin.
Night
'night.
I know :)
Hey. Did it get any better after 2 am?
Def better!
How are you? How's everything?
I'm pretty good. Jb got layed off and is going through a break up so he's pretty much driving me crazy :P How r u?

Going thru a breakup?
I'm okay. Trying to get these tracks done today or tomorrow so I can have some time off to hang out and play.
I hope u get through them then!
Did u work out those songs?
Hoping to finish them today.
Are you guys going tonight?
I have plans. Jb really wants to go but has no $ and he doesn't want to go without some. So, not sure what he's gonna do yet.

What're you doing?
Tell JB that I confirmed that it's free...and I don't think m & s are going. So it may just be me & x. If he goes, I'll buy him a drink.
I already had plans with a friend when Jb told me about the event. I'll let him know about the drink ;) I hope he goes. He needs to get out.
Jb will Fb you later to make plans if he decides to go. Will that be cool?
What time were u planning on going?
We were going to leave around 6 - just to chill at the casino for a minute before the show.
Give him my number.
The company took his phone but ill leave him the number. He could use the house phone.
Or he could FB me. Whatever works.
Cool. Thx :)
When's the show begin and end?
8...and i'm guessing 9, 930?
He thinks he'll be there at 8.
Cool. Tell him to get all of his friends to go ! ;-)
Hey. How's things?
Good. Did u get those songs finished?
Almost. But - putting them off for a day and a half...then cranking them out when I have the place to myself on Sunday.
Cool
What's your sched like?
Did jb have a good time last night?
Yes, he thought it was fun and really cool. He wished he could have stayed longer but he was tired
My Saturday is full and I have plans Sunday too. Then I have late eve plans on Monday probably. Nothing else planned yet
